title: Khursheed urges political harmony for national development
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 23 (APP):Senior leader of the Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP), Syed Khursheed Ahmed Shah on Tuesday called upon  all political parties to foster greater unity and harmony to achieve much-needed national development and prosperity.
In a statement, Shah emphasized that Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) should abandon its negative politics and engage in positive and constructive activities that benefit the country. He believed that the PTI founder had laid the foundation of the politics of hatred and violence in Pakistan.
Shah alleged that the prevailing economic situation in the country was a result of PTI’s wrong policies at both national and international levels, terming it a “deliberate attempt.”
He urged PTI to change its approach to contribute to the country’s progress.
